attributes.name: Fire Staff
attributes.description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.
attributes.parsed_description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.

attributes.name: Fire Staff
attributes.description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.
attributes.parsed_description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.

attributes.name: Fire Staff
attributes.description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.
attributes.parsed_description: A vestige of an ancient civilization that had mastered pyromancy.

attributes.name: Fire Staff of the Eternal Watcher
attributes.name_with_affixes: Fire Staff of the Eternal Watcher
attributes.description: "My flame burns forever. My watch is eternal."
attributes.parsed_description: "My flame burns forever. My watch is eternal."

attributes.name: Fire Staff of the Frozen Guardian
attributes.name_with_affixes: Fire Staff of the Frozen Guardian
attributes.description: "It is difficult to keep warm in such a frigid place, and yet I try."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is difficult to keep warm in such a frigid place, and yet I try."

attributes.name: Firestorm Spellstaff
attributes.description: "Without notice the sky opened up and fire began raining down from the heavens."
attributes.parsed_description: "Without notice the sky opened up and fire began raining down from the heavens."

attributes.name: Firevine Battlestaff
attributes.description: "Ever-burning vines cover every piece of this staff.
attributes.parsed_description: "Ever-burning vines cover every piece of this staff.

attributes.name: First Contact
attributes.description: "He gently placed the crude blade in one of the Stranger's four hands. The Stranger smiled."
attributes.parsed_description: "He gently placed the crude blade in one of the Stranger's four hands. The Stranger smiled."

attributes.name: First Flame
attributes.description: "When humans discovered fire, the course of history was changed."
attributes.parsed_description: "When humans discovered fire, the course of history was changed."

attributes.name: First Light Beacon
attributes.description: A Life Staff, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of First Light.
attributes.parsed_description: A Life Staff, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of First Light.

attributes.name: First Mate's Blade
attributes.description: "I found her, long though lost to the sea. There she was in the sand, not a spec of rust on her."
attributes.parsed_description: "I found her, long though lost to the sea. There she was in the sand, not a spec of rust on her."

attributes.name: First Mate's Rapier
attributes.description: "As you are the right hand of the captain, so is this weapon your right hand."
attributes.parsed_description: "As you are the right hand of the captain, so is this weapon your right hand."

attributes.name: Flamebound Spellstaff
attributes.description: "You belong to the eternal flame."
attributes.parsed_description: "You belong to the eternal flame."

attributes.name: Flamebreath
attributes.description: "Put down your staff and let the dragon breath."
attributes.parsed_description: "Put down your staff and let the dragon breath."

attributes.name: Flame of Hephaestus
attributes.description: "With these flames I shall forge a new order, more pure and just."
attributes.parsed_description: "With these flames I shall forge a new order, more pure and just."

attributes.name: Flame of the Corrupted Keeper
attributes.description: "He guarded the fires of corruption for eons before his undoing."
attributes.parsed_description: "He guarded the fires of corruption for eons before his undoing."

attributes.name: Flame of the Wilds
attributes.description: "Fires are a natural occurence. They uproot the old and bring in the new."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fires are a natural occurence. They uproot the old and bring in the new."

attributes.name: Flames of Rebirth
attributes.description: "Be born anew in my fire!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Be born anew in my fire!"

attributes.name: Flames of the Breach
attributes.description: "The fringes of the void lick forth from the portal and burn those who dare to enter."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fringes of the void lick forth from the portal and burn those who dare to enter."

attributes.name: Flamesworn Great Staff
attributes.description: "A hulking staff of the flamesworn mages."
attributes.parsed_description: "A hulking staff of the flamesworn mages."

attributes.name: Flamewake
attributes.description: "All that remains in my path is ash and dust."
attributes.parsed_description: "All that remains in my path is ash and dust."

attributes.name: Flamewhisper
attributes.description: "The subtlest spark can grow into the most powerful fire."
attributes.parsed_description: "The subtlest spark can grow into the most powerful fire."

attributes.name: Flaming Branch
attributes.description: "A massive branch with an everburning flame affixed to the end."
attributes.parsed_description: "A massive branch with an everburning flame affixed to the end."

attributes.name: Flaming Brand
attributes.description: "Wear this mark with pride. Let the world know you serve me."
attributes.parsed_description: "Wear this mark with pride. Let the world know you serve me."

attributes.name: Flaming Fire Staff
attributes.description: "The fire seems to be caught on fire. Odd."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fire seems to be caught on fire. Odd."

attributes.name: Flaming Great Axe
attributes.description: "Hot off the forge."
attributes.parsed_description: "Hot off the forge."

attributes.name: Flrdr Mjlnir
attributes.description: "When lightning strikes twice, you can bet Flrdr Mjlnir is near."
attributes.parsed_description: "When lightning strikes twice, you can bet Flrdr Mjlnir is near."

attributes.name: Flare Spark
attributes.description: "When lightning hits the ground, fire leaps forth."
attributes.parsed_description: "When lightning hits the ground, fire leaps forth."

attributes.name: Flash of Light
attributes.description: "And in an instant, she was gone."
attributes.parsed_description: "And in an instant, she was gone."

attributes.name: Flatbow
attributes.description: Though old, this bow draws as though it was strung mere days ago.
attributes.parsed_description: Though old, this bow draws as though it was strung mere days ago.

attributes.name: Flawless Grandmaster's Spear
attributes.description: "To become a grandmaster spearman requires decades of training and dedication. When one achieves such an unparalleled feat they are given a spear crafted by the finest artisans of Aeternum."
attributes.parsed_description: "To become a grandmaster spearman requires decades of training and dedication. When one achieves such an unparalleled feat they are given a spear crafted by the finest artisans of Aeternum."

attributes.name: Fleeting Reality
attributes.description: "The weapon seems to shift in and out of this plane of reality. It's neither entirely here nor entirely not."
attributes.parsed_description: "The weapon seems to shift in and out of this plane of reality. It's neither entirely here nor entirely not."

attributes.name: Fleshbinder
attributes.description: "Siphon the spirit and leave the body behind."
attributes.parsed_description: "Siphon the spirit and leave the body behind."

attributes.name: Fleshbinder's Recurve
attributes.description: "When my arrow tastes your blood, you shall be bound to me."
attributes.parsed_description: "When my arrow tastes your blood, you shall be bound to me."

attributes.name: Fleshcrafter's Harvesting Rifle
attributes.description: "There is no more efficient way to gather flesh than with a rifle."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is no more efficient way to gather flesh than with a rifle."

attributes.name: Fleshneedle
attributes.description: "Stitch yourself up and get back in the fight."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stitch yourself up and get back in the fight."

attributes.name: Fleshripping Great Axe
attributes.description: "A single cut will not suffice."
attributes.parsed_description: "A single cut will not suffice."
